# Symbol of Dispelling (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 8]], [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[8th Level Witch Spells|Witch 8]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 15]], [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, S, M (pure grain alchol and powdered diamond worth 5,000 gp)

**Range:** 0 ft.; see text

**Effect:** One symbol

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Inner Sea Gods (WotC)Â­, pgs. 243

This spell functions as *[[Symbol of Death (Spell)|symbol of death]]*, except that all creatures within 40 feet of the symbol of dispelling are instead affected as if by the area dispel function of *[[Dispel Magic, Greater (Spell)|greater dispel magic]]*. Attempt a dispel check when casting* symbol of dispelling*. Once the symbol is triggered, apply the result of that check to each creature in the area, as well as each object that is the target of one or more spells. Unlike *[[Symbol of Death (Spell)|symbol of death]]**, symbol of dispelling* grants no saving throws, and it is not subject to spell resistance.
